translations: n.精湛的技巧；出色的表演；大胆的行为
adj.（表演或作品）炫耀的，华丽的；技艺精湛的

sentences.sentence: The film is directed with a technical bravura and visual splendour.
sentences.translation: 这部电影拍摄技术华丽，视觉效果惊艳。

sentences.sentence: It was a bravura performance by Denzel Washington.
sentences.translation: 那是丹泽尔·华盛顿的一次绚丽表演。

sentences.sentence: What little scholarship has existed on Ernest Hemingway—considering his stature—has focused on trying to unmask the man behind the bravura.
sentences.translation: 考虑到欧内斯特·海明威的地位，关于他的少量研究都集中在试图揭开他虚张声势的面具上。
